headline.main: Dance Is Given At East Hampton; Benefit at Maidstone Club Held In the Interests of British War Relief Society

lead_paragraph: EAST HAMPTON, L.I., Aug. 2 -- Tonight's dinner dance for benefit of the British War Relief Society, Inc., given at the Maidstone Club, was a great success, attended by hundreds from all the Hamptons. Mrs. Prank Parsons Shepard headed the committee arranging the event, with Mrs. A. Wallace Chauncey as vice chairman.
abstract: L I Maidstone Club benefit for Brit War Relief Soc
